properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_NO , REST_NO , NICKNAME , REVIEW_CONT , TO_CHAR(REVIEW_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REVIEW_DATE , REVIEW_LIKE , REVIEW_DISLIKE , RATE_TASTE , RATE_PRICE , RATE_SERVICE , ROUND(((RATE_TASTE + RATE_PRICE + RATE_SERVICE)/3)/5*100, 0) "RATE_AVG" FROM REVIEW JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = REVIEW_WRITER) WHERE REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' AND REST_NO = ? ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVIEW_NO, '[^0-9]+', '')) DESC ) A )
